about.title: About GEKO
about.mission: We believe that good design is for everyone. Our mission is to help you discover furniture that transforms your space into a home.
about.missionDescription: Founded on the principles of Scandinavian minimalism, GEKO serves as a digital showroom for furniture that balances form and function. We curate specifications and design details to help you make informed decisions, focusing on sustainability, clean lines, and smart storage solutions.
about.valuesDescription: These core principles guide every decision we make and every product we showcase.
about.sustainabilityDesc: We prioritize eco-friendly materials and production methods that respect our planet.
about.functionalityDesc: Every piece is designed with purpose, maximizing utility without compromising aesthetics.
about.accessibilityDesc: Good design should be available to everyone, not just a privileged few.
about.craftsmanshipDesc: We celebrate the art of furniture making and attention to detail in every product.
about.journeyDescription: From humble beginnings to a thriving design community.
about.readyToTransformDesc: Explore our curated collection of furniture designed to elevate your everyday living.
